meanings.sent1: She smiled elatedly after receiving the good news.

meanings.definition: Feeling or showing great happiness or excitement.
meanings.sent1: The elatedly crowd cheered for their team's victory.
meanings.sent2: She wore an elatedly expression when she saw her surprise birthday party.
meanings.sent3: The elatedly students jumped up and down when they heard about the snow day.
meanings.sent4: The elatedly bride danced with her new husband at the reception.
meanings.sent5: The elatedly child ran to show their parents the drawing they made.
